table.name: or_stop
table.description: This table defines intermediate stops on an order.

columns.name: OR_STOP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the stop associated to the order release for multi-stop orders.

columns.name: OR_STOP_XID
columns.description: The XID for the stop associated to the order release for multi-stop orders.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_GID
columns.description: The order release associated with this stop.

columns.name: OR_STOP_SEQ
columns.description: The stop number within the order release. Stop number = 1 is the pickup stop, and the max (stop number) for a shipment is the delivery stop.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location GID for the shipment stop.

columns.name: EARLY_ARRIVAL_TIME
columns.description: The arrival date and time for the stop, and when IS_APPT is Y, this field is early appointment time.

columns.name: LATE_ARRIVAL_TIME
columns.description: The late arrival date and time for the stop, and when IS_APPT is Y, this field is late appointment time.

columns.name: IS_APPT
columns.description: A Y/N field indicating that the times are for appointments, when IS_APPT is Y, EARLY/LATE_ARRIVAL_TIME are appointment times.

columns.name: IS_APPT_REQUIRED
columns.description: A Y/N field to indicate if appointment is required.

columns.name: IS_APPT_CONFIRM_REQUIRED
columns.description: A Y/N field to indicate if appointment confirmation is required.

columns.name: IS_APPT_CONFIRMED
columns.description: A Y/N field to indicate the appointment is confirmed.

columns.name: LEG_POSITION
columns.description: Define where to insert this stop in a multi-stop situation.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
